a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths from famines by previous population growth
Deaths in famines that are estimated to have killed 100,000 people or more. Population growth rate in the 20
Population growth rate in the 20 years preceding the famine
Data source: World Peace Foundation (2025); Population based on various sources (2024)
Note: Famines are plotted by their start date.
